title: Zhong Sauce
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
directions: Directions:1. In a wok or frying pan over high heat, warm the neutral oil to 350°F / 175°C. Add the garlic and fry until golden, 3 to 5 minutes.2. Bring the oil to 260°F / 125°C on an instant-read thermometer and add the chili powder, stirring well as the chilies release their fragrance and color into the oil.3. Add the sesame oil and turn off the heat to allow the chili oil to cool down.4. Transfer into a medium bowl, combine with the Sichuan sweet soy sauce and mix well.5. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 months.
